title: Transactions through Roshan Digital Account cross $ 800 million, PM told
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 08 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan was on Thursday informed that the transactions made through Roshan Digital Account had crossed US $ 800 million – which was a good omen.
The Prime Minister was told this during a meeting with Minister for Finance Hammad Azhar and Governor State Bank Raza Baqir, who called on him.
Media error: Format(s) not supported or source(s) not found
During the meeting, the country’s economic situation was discussed.
